name: iPhone 13 Pro
description: The iPhone 13 Pro features a Super Retina XDR display, A15 Bionic chip, and a Pro camera system for stunning photography.

name: Samsung Galaxy S21
description: Experience the Galaxy S21's 120Hz display, advanced camera system, and lightning-fast Exynos 2100 processor.

name: Google Pixel 6
description: Google Pixel 6 offers an exceptional camera, pure Android experience, and Tensor chip for enhanced performance.

name: OnePlus 9 Pro
description: OnePlus 9 Pro boasts a fluid 120Hz display, Snapdragon 888, and Hasselblad camera for professional-quality photos.

name: Xiaomi Mi 11
description: Xiaomi Mi 11 delivers flagship performance with a Snapdragon 888, AMOLED display, and 108MP camera.

name: Sony Xperia 5 III
description: Sony Xperia 5 III combines compact size, powerful performance, and a cinematic display for a premium experience.

name: Huawei P50 Pro
description: The Huawei P50 Pro features an exceptional camera system, powerful performance, and a sleek design.

name: Oppo Find X3 Pro
description: Oppo Find X3 Pro offers a stunning 10-bit display, advanced camera system, and fast performance.

name: Realme GT 5G
description: Realme GT 5G delivers flagship performance, 120Hz display, and a stylish design at an affordable price.

name: Vivo X60 Pro
description: Vivo X60 Pro offers a gimbal camera system, smooth performance, and a stunning AMOLED display.

name: iPhone 12
description: iPhone 12 features a stunning OLED display, A14 Bionic chip, and 5G capabilities for blazing-fast speeds.

name: Samsung Galaxy Note 20 Ultra
description: Galaxy Note 20 Ultra is the ultimate productivity device with S Pen and a large 6.9-inch display.
